# Software

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE, out.width = '60%', fig.align="center"}
knitr::include_graphics("graphics/tessellation_cropped.png")
```

-   [**sceptre**](https://katsevich-lab.github.io/sceptre/): statistically rigorous, massively scalable single-cell CRISPR screen analysis
-   [**ondisc**](https://timothy-barry.github.io/ondisc/): out-of-core and cluster-scale computing on single-cell data

**Broader use of these tools**

-   Industry: [10x Genomics](https://www.10xgenomics.com/analysis-guides/single-cell-crispr-screen-analysis-with-sceptre) (main commercial supplier of single-cell CRISPR screen kits)

-   Example research: [Chardon et al., Nat. Com. 2024](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-024-52490-4); [Morris et al., Science 2023](https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.adh7699)
